definition: to undertake to perform work within a time limit and according to specifications/to contract for a job/contractor
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: So the owner must pay attention to this, to control cost in construction stage consciously.
sentences.chinese: 工程结算支付是承包工程合同管理的核心。

sentences.english: The pictures show the statistics of China's investment and the project-contracting cooperation in West Asia.
sentences.chinese: 图为中国对西亚投资及承包工程合作统计。

sentences.english: Foreign project-contracting and labor services cooperation have made relatively large progress.
sentences.chinese: 对外承包工程和劳务合作取得较大成绩。

sentences.english: The investment control during construction by supervision engineer in unit price contracted project was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 浅议了施工阶段监理对单价承包工程的投资控制。

sentences.english: Reductions in construction jobs limit growth, further depressing housing markets.
sentences.chinese: 承包工程的减少抑制了增长，进一步使得房市惨淡。

sentences.english: Claim is a common economic phenomenon for International projects.
sentences.chinese: 索赔是国际承包工程中经常发生的一种经济现象。

sentences.english: Outworkers in the clothing industry are usually badly paid.
sentences.chinese: 服装业中的外包工通常工酬菲薄。

sentences.english: Fourth, overseas project contracting and labor service have developed swiftly.
sentences.chinese: 四是对外承包工程和劳务合作迅速发展。

sentences.english: Ask a contractor to estimate for the repair of the building .
sentences.chinese: 请一位包工估计一下修这个楼得花多少钱。

sentences.english: The firm agreed to contract for labour and material.
We can do the samples from design to produce in oversea market.
sentences.chinese: 可以从设计包工包料到出成品，产品直销国内外。

definition: job paid according to the amount of work done/contract work
plumbing and electrical work/tradesman who does both plumbing and electrical work
to release from work at the end of the day
migrant worker/temporary worker enlisted on a public project
